Klasse AnswerDTO

java.lang.Object
quizlogic.DataTransportObject
quizlogic.dto.AnswerDTO
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Serializable
public class AnswerDTO extends DataTransportObject
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a quiz answer.

This DTO can be serialized and persisted in storage (e.g., database). Each answer contains:

  • The answer text
  • A flag indicating if it is the correct answer
  • The ID of the associated question

Implements common DTO functionality from DataTransportObject.

Seit:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Christos Poulios

  • Konstruktordetails

    • AnswerDTO

      public AnswerDTO()
      Default constructor for creating a new AnswerDTO. Initializes correctness to false and questionId to -1.

    • AnswerDTO

      public AnswerDTO(int id)
      Constructor for creating an AnswerDTO for an existing persisted answer record.
      Parameter:
      id - the unique ID of the answer

    • AnswerDTO

      public AnswerDTO(String answerText, boolean correct)
      Constructor for creating a new answer with text and correctness.
      Parameter:
      answerText - the text content of the answer
      correct - true if this answer is correct, false otherwise

    • AnswerDTO

      public AnswerDTO(int id, String answerText, boolean correct, int questionId)
      Constructor for creating a complete AnswerDTO with all fields.
      Parameter:
      id - the unique ID of the answer
      answerText - the text content of the answer
      correct - true if this answer is correct
      questionId - the ID of the question this answer belongs to

    • contentEquals

      protected boolean contentEquals(DataTransportObject other)
      Compares the content of this AnswerDTO to another DTO for equality. Used when both entities are new and have no assigned ID.
      Angegeben von:
      contentEquals in Klasse DataTransportObject
      Parameter:
      other - another DataTransportObject to compare against
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the answer text, correctness, and question ID match

    • contentHashCode

      protected int contentHashCode()
      Computes a hash code based on the answer's content. Used when the answer is a new entity with no ID.
      Angegeben von:
      contentHashCode in Klasse DataTransportObject
      Gibt zurück:
      hash code from answerText, correct, and questionId

    • getContentString

      protected String getContentString()
      Returns a string summary of this answer's content for debugging/logging purposes.
      Angegeben von:
      getContentString in Klasse DataTransportObject
      Gibt zurück:
      String in the format: answerText='...', correct=..., questionId=...

    • validate

      protected void validate()
      Validates that the answer has valid data.
      • Answer text must not be null or empty
      • Answer text must not exceed 500 characters
      Angegeben von:
      validate in Klasse DataTransportObject
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails
